name: Notre Dame des Brumes - Proto
description:
Hello !

Welcome to Notre Dame des Brumes, a mysterious chapel on a cliff inspired by a real place I love. I always thought the actual location would make a great game level, so there it is !

I made this playable prototype for a 3D environment to learn Unreal Engine 4 environment creation process and the Substance suite. It is fairly rough -no sounds or accessibilty options for instance- but I wanted to make it playable anyway so here it is.
